item.title: Privacy
item.description: Your privacy is important to us. Findmomo series game itself does not collect your data, except for Google Admob ads. Google Admob maybe collect your advertising identifier or location. Anyone can limit Ad tracking through iPhone privacy settings. If you received asking location service notifaction, you can turn off location service to Findmomo app.
